name: This Little Light Of Mine
chorusText:
This little light of mine   (    )
This little light of mine
I’m gonna let it shine
                     Let it shine                 x3

On Monday, gonna let it shine
On Tuesday, gonna let it shine
On Wednesday, gonna let it shine
On Thursday, oh yeah
On Friday, gonna let it shine
On Saturday, gonna let it shine
On Sundaymorning, gonna praise my Lord
And let my little light shine
Praise Him, Praise Him
Praise Him in the morning,
praise Him in the noon time
Praise Him, Praise Him
praise Him when the sun goes down

I don’t know what you came to do
But I’m here to praise the Lord
2 of 2
